name: Verte Brave
description:
Verte Brave

Become Skelly, the low ranked skeleton who wishes to be a part of a human village! However, your leader Necrolord seems to have other plans with it! Will Skelly be able to protect the village that hates monsters?

FEATURES:
  • Legend of Zelda inspired combat gameplay
  • A charming story about prejudice, acceptance and friendship
  • Many unique and lovable characters
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Minimum 1.1 GB available space
  • PC Windows only
  • Keyboard or Xbox controller
CONTROLS: Keyboard: Xbox: Arrow keys Joystick / D-pad MoveA A Talk / Lift / ThrowX X Attack X (Hold)X (Hold)Spin AttackZ B BonerangS Y BombEsc Start PauseEnterAConfirm

(This game is a student project made in 8 weeks, created by 13 students at The Game Assembly. Credits is shown in the game. No further development will be made.)
